Description: This middleware automatically detects and recovers from corrupted Examine indexes in Umbraco applications. It ensures your site's search functionality remains intact by triggering a controlled index rebuild when needed. Easy to integrate and configure, with built-in logging for monitoring rebuild activities.
Title: Knowit.Umbraco.CorruptIndexFixer
